ARABIC: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمًا وَرُفَٰتًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ خَلْقًا جَدِيدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'What! When we are bones and crumbled dust, will we then be raised up as a new creation!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they say: "When we are turned to bones and bits, shall we be raised as a new creation?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say: "When we are turned to bones and particles (of dust), shall we truly be raised up as a new creation?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The pagans say, "When we become mere bones and dust, shall we then be brought back to life again?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When we have become bones and decomposed, will we really be raised up anew?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "When we are bones and fragments (destroyed), should we really be resurrected (to be) a new creation"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: What! when we shall have become bones and decayed particles, shall we then certainly be raised up, being a new creation?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'What, when we are bones and broken bits, shall we really be raised up again in a new creation?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When we are bones and fragments, shall we forsooth, be raised up as a new creation?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What!" they say, "When we are turned to bones and dust, shall we be restored to life?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: when we shall have become bones and fragments, shall we in sooth be raised as a new creation?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘What, when we have become bones and dust, shall we really be raised in a new creation?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "What! when we are reduced to bones and dust, should we really be raised up (to be) a new creation?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "When we are bones and fragments (destroyed), should we really be resurrected (to be) a new creation?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What' they say. 'When we are (turned to) bones and broken bits, shall we be raised again in a new creation'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When we have become bones and fragments, shall we really be resurrected as a new creation?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:49] And they say, in denial of the Resurrection: ‘What, when we are bones and fragments, shall we really be raised up in a new creation?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say) i.e. al-Nadr Ibn al-Harth and his host: (When we are) rotten (bones and fragments) scattered dust, (shall we, forsooth, be raised up) shall we be revived (as a new creation) shall the spirit be renewed in us after death?
